resource_data.description: Here are some useful links and documents:

resource.title: Sales and Use Tax Explained (UC Davis Use Only)

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript:
<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="The Disbursement Voucher (DV) document is used to make payments not related to the procurement of goods or services. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="For any payments against a Purchase Order (PO), please use the Payment Request (PREQ) document.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Do NOT include sensitive information on the KFS DV document or on any of the electronic attachments, such as Social Security numbers (SSN), personal health care information (PHI), and personal banking information (excluding the Wire Transfer tab, which is approved for banking information).
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The Disbursement Voucher, or D V document can be used for:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Permit fees
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Outbound freights
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Research participants
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Memberships
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Honoraria
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="And Travel and Entertainment-related expenses that are not paid through the campus AggieTravel system, such as payments direct to vendors.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="For professional expenses reimbursements not covered by the Travel or Entertainment policy, please use the AggieTravel 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="system, report type 9. Professional Expenses. A DV document may be used for specific expenses that are not available in AggieTravel.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Before you start the DV, if possible, gather the information that you will need to create it to expedite the process.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="For example, the payee name and address, the check amount, the account number and object code." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="To start a DV, go to the Accounts Payable tab, and select the Disbursement Voucher option." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="The Disbursement Voucher document opens.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Observe the table at the top right of the screen.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Here you can see the document number, who initiated it, as well as the status and date created." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="There are certain fields in the Kuali system that are required. These fields are denoted by an asterisk before the field name, as you can see here. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="If you skip a required field and try to submit the document, you will receive an error message." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The first section of this document is the Document Overview. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Enter a short description, this field allows 40 characters and is required..
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The organization document number is optional but can be useful when you are searching for this document at a later time.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Now, lets move on to the Payment and Payee Information section.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Start by clicking the Payee ID lookup icon. This action will populate the reason code.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Note that the information that youve selected is automatically added to the document.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Before we continue, we have an important tip to give you.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Kuali does not have an auto-save function. If the system is left idle, you will be logged off and you document edits will be lost. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="We recommend that you save your document after you ve completed the document overview and entered the payment and payee information required fields.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The pay date defaults to the day the document is created.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="You can use the date selector to choose a different (future) date.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="The payment type field allows you to select whether this is a foreign payee or not.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text=" Use the drop down menu to choose yes or no.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The special handling box allows you to indicate a special address where the payment should go.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="This box is not commonly checked since it is used only under special circumstances.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="In general, the payment address should already be indicated on the document from when you performed the search for the payee.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Observe that when we select the special handling checkbox, a warning message pops up instructing the user to add a note explaining the need for special handling.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="You may want to send a form, a remittance stub or some other document along with the check.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Please note that most vendors do not require an original payment stub.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="We will show you how to attach files to the DV document later in this training.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The university groups payments to vendors but they will still be listed separately on the check statement so the vendor can easily identify what the payments are for.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The check stub notes field provides a space for adding annotations to the check.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="This is helpful because if tells the vendor what the check is for.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="We do not recommend putting any payee name in this field, to avoid problems.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text=" The invoice information section.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="This section is optional. As you can see, there are no asterisks flagging required fields, however, if you have an invoice number, or any other information to complete the fields available here, feel free to complete them. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Thank you for watching.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="For more information , please visit the Finance and Business website.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Please click the next button to exit the course.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block /> </Content> </Document>
